name: Meltdown (Pygame Jam 7)
description:
Power the crystals to win!

Made in 1 Week for Pygame Community Easter Jam 2023.

The theme was 'Particle Overdose'.

Made with Pygame

Controls:

  • [WASD] or Arrows to Move.
  • [Space] or [Enter] to grab and drag objects.
  • [R] to Restart.
  • [Esc] to Pause.

Credits:

  • Art, Code, Design, and Concept by Ghast
  • Menu titles generated using cooltext.com
  • Font: m6x11 by Daniel Linssen
  • Sound effects generated using sfxr / jfxr
  • Music generated using soundraw.io

The source can be viewed here.
